Package Controller

Class GamePanelController

java.lang.Object
Controller.Controller<GamePanel>
Controller.GamePanelController
public class GamePanelController extends Controller<GamePanel>
Specialize Controller on GamePanel. Class used to get the inputs in the GamePanel and to update the UnoGameTable with the changes made by the user. It manages the player's turn and the Animations to be called in the view
Author:
D'annibale Luigi, Venturini Daniele

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GamePanelController(GameChoiceController.GameMode gameMode, ViewPlayer[] players)
    Creates a new GamePanelController with its associated view (GamePanel), instantiating a new UnoGameTable with the given GameChoiceController.GameMode and ViewPlayers If the GamePanel is hidden, then the game is paused, and it resumes when it gets shown again.

      Creates a new GamePanelController with its associated view (GamePanel), instantiating a new UnoGameTable with the given GameChoiceController.GameMode and ViewPlayers If the GamePanel is hidden, then the game is paused, and it resumes when it gets shown again.

      players -

  • Method Details

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      Starts a new game and manages the first card on the table

    • quitGame

      public void quitGame()
      Stops all the animations and paintings in the GamePanel

    • playersTurn

      private boolean playersTurn()
      Checks if the user has to play his turn
      Returns:
      true if it's the user's turn, false otherwise

    • viewPlayerClick

      private void viewPlayerClick(MouseEvent e)
      Based on the click coordinates on the view, it checks if user has clicked on:
      - UNO
      - another player if exposable
      - continue or exit game
      - a card to draw
      - a card to play
      - skip turn
      Parameters:
      e -

    • skipTurnBranch

      private void skipTurnBranch(Player currentPlayer)
      If the current Player can skip and the drawing animation is finished, then it skips turn
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer -

    • shoutUnoBranch

      private void shoutUnoBranch(Player currentPlayer)
      The current Player shouts UNO and the starts the related TextAnimation
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer -

    • exposeBranch

      private void exposeBranch(ViewPlayer[] viewPlayers, Point mouseClickPosition)
      If the TextAnimation it immediately returns. Otherwise, check if the clicked player didn't say one and expose him if true, starting the related TextAnimation
      Parameters:
      viewPlayers -
      mouseClickPosition -

    • continueBranch

      private void continueBranch(Point p)
      Checks if the user clicked on the continue or exit button, and does the related action
      Parameters:
      p -

    • drawCardBranch

      private void drawCardBranch(ViewPlayer currentViewPlayer)
      Checks if the given ViewPlayer and then calls the draw method if true
      Parameters:
      currentViewPlayer -

    • playCardBranch

      private void playCardBranch(ViewRotatableCard card)
      Checks if the clicked ViewRotatableCard is playable.
      If true the card is played and its action is called (only if the Player didn't win). Otherwise, an error sound is played.
      Parameters:
      card -

    • tryCardActionPerformance

      private void tryCardActionPerformance(Options.OptionsBuilder parameters)
      Tries to do the action related to the card with the given Options.
      If other parameters are needed, they are asked to the user and then tries again to perform the card action;
      Parameters:
      parameters -

    • drawOutCard

      private void drawOutCard(ViewPlayer currentViewPlayer)
      Starts the FlippingAnimation of the ViewCard on top of the deck. When it ends, draw card MovingAnimation is started
      Parameters:
      currentViewPlayer - the current player
